name: Queen Maria
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: You're the most special thing to me  Mine! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah... Mine Mine Mine
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Your presence Mine, love, and smile all make me go crazy for you! You are the best thing that ever happened to me! Happy birthday Mine Queen, the love of my life! May this special day be filled with infinite love and wonder for you!
replayText: Mine click here, if you want to watch it again.
